Kup/Perceptor/Hydras:

Kup went inside the Ark and left  Elita inside her R=
oon and lock her down there. After that he left her in a safe place he star=
ted to chase Nightshift  and shouted while he opened fire against Nightshif=
t" You wont take the Matrix, monster"


Perceptor:

"What The pit are you d=
oing there"Shouted the blind Predacon  by comlink while he typed a secret m=
essage to Hydras and another to Rodimius. The message to Rodimus said "Rodi=
mus. Take the lady and lead her to the Secret Room, also took a cloaking de=
vise and use it to hide her signature"




From: Sandy 
Sent: Wednesday, Ma=
rch 17, 2010 9:27 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Ro=
dimus/BlackFortress


  
A com link message is suddenly sent to Perceptor v=
ia Night Shift's remote com link.

"Yo, Perceptor, it's me, Night Shift, I'=
m near the Ark now, but I got side tracked by the Autobot, Tucson! He's got=
 Prime's Matrix and he's not givn' it up without a fight! Ya might wanna se=
nd some backup out here if you're still game for that Matrix!" 

Over the c=
om link, Tucson's voice is heard.

"OVER MY DEAD CHASSE!" 

And then a powe=
rful smack, as he decks Night Shift in the jaw. Then another powerful smack=
 which now sends Tucson flying off his feet and onto his back! 

" Right ba=
ck at ya pretty boy!"
